page.title: 20SPORTS AFTERNOON
page.content: On{sports afternoon}I was captain wearing two green bands. There were quite a few races,{beanbag, skipping, {obstacle, sack}and{running.}I entered for running sack and obstacle, I came first in obstacle and second in {running}and sack. Our team won the team shield so it will get another green ribbon on it.The green team has wont 2 years{running }while I have been at this school.My favourate race is the obstacle.First you had to run with the{egg and spoon,}throw the away,dribble a{ball}to a{shinty stick.Use the{shinty stick}to hit the ball to the next obstacle.Go through 3 sets of hoops which get smaller each time,then run to the finishing line.
